title: Excellent German food
text: This restaurant was recommended by a friend and it didn't disappoint. Incredibly tasty, well cooked and presented local food. The trout was amazing, the seasonning spot on. Can highly recommend eating here.

title: Lovely little German bistro
text: My daughter and I ate here on our one night stay in Rothenburg, really quaint little German bistro with good hearty food. The wine was from an excellent local selection. Service was very good, the waiting staff very hospitable and we weren't rushed despite taking a table reserved for later that evening after having stopped on the off chance. Highly recommended.

title: Lovely atmosphere, worth a visit
text: We had read good reviews on this pub and decided to have a meal there on the last night of our break in mundesley. On arrival we were told by the landlord that a table magician was entertaining that night and he didn't disappoint! Brilliant fun! The food was really tasty, a good selection of pasta and pizza dishes plus great selection of wine and beers. Definitely recommend, oh and dog friendly!

title: Lovely little dog friendly tearoom
text: We had lunch at the Buttercup tearooms, the food was simple but good and the coffee perfect. Great service and best of all our little Jack Russell was allowed in so good all round

title: Decent, tasty local food
text: We were tempted to try out to Kati Allo after reading a number of good reviews and we weren't disappointed. The food is all on display and the owner patiently explains what is on the menu. We had caramelised aubergine and onions, lovely rich flavours and stuffed peppers. Simple food prepared really well and cheap!

title: Breathtaking
text: The most incredible experience to walk to the top of the acropolis and see the breathtaking views below. Be warned, trainers are a must as the marble has been worn smooth in places and take a water bottle with you to fill, there are water fountains at the top. Beautiful by night too, the whole place is lit up.

title: Amazing experience
text: Really loved this place, absolutely awesome experience! When you climb the stairs to the top to look over the whole arena the view is simply breath taking! The audio guide takes you through the history and the before and after photos showing the renovation really make you appreciate this beautiful historical site. A real must do in Athens.

title: Good place for lunch
text: Quick, easy, simple, cheap but tasty noodle meals to go, what's not to like? Freshly cooked while you wait, ideal for a brief stop on a full on day of sightseeing.

title: Wow!
text: What can I say? From start to finish the highlight of an amazing day in Athens, what fabulous hospitality and food! From the moment we sat down we were wined and dined in style, persuaded to try the fish of the day and absolutely no regrets! Really recommend the Liondi, the reviews were bang on, honestly fab food and lovely atmosphere.

title: Lovely last minute find
text: Let down last minute by another pub restaurant in the area, it looked like our family reunion was about to go down the pan. However, The Rose and Crown came to the rescue and fitted all 8 of us in with very short notice. The food was typical pub grub but a good menu, well cooked and good size portions. Very happy with our meal here.
